MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the WA5 postcode area of Warrington. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 1am. Our engineers have arrived at the local substation and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2:20 AM on Monday, 22 February 2021.
